column5: Dad, Warren, Marc and I, leave tomorrow for Wawa.  We will be flying into some remote lake outside of Pukaskwa on Wednesday morning for four nights at a one room cabin on a tiny brookie lake.  We will have boats and motors on two adjoining lakes as well.  We expect that since this is the only cabin in the area, we will find complete solitude, and lots of those pretty little feesh. I hope the 11  hour drive will be worth it.  Pictures and lies on my return.  douG
It's already been said, but have a great trip bud! The lake you're flying into is one of my all time favourites. (don't forget the minnow trap)
Have a super relaxing time, Doug. Catch lots and take pics!
Good luck. It should be a good one.  Enjoy!
....Wow, your very own private brookie paradise for four days. I'm jealous. Have a great time Doug.
Have a great trip.  Just a tip....pack warm....it snowed here today and we have a frost warning for tonihgt.
Enjoy yourself and take lots of pics! Joe
have a great time and look forward to the report
